name: ZINE
description:
ZINE is an influencer marketing technology that uses advanced analytics to connect brands with influencers. Our transparent and data driven approach to influencer marketing enables marketers and PRs to produce maximum ROI, while our cutting edge technology eliminates the manual labour of campaigns, yet preserves your personal influencer relationships.

ZINE also creates free tools for influencers to showcase their personal brand, analyse their following and promote their services to digital marketers, agencies & PRs. The ZINE Media Kit is the first fully digital and continuously updated media kit in the market and allows influencers to quickly and effectively introduce themselves to potential partners.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Caroline Duong
team.bioHtml: Founder & CEO @ZINE

team.title: Full Stack Developer
team.name: Semir Hodzic
team.bioHtml:
Full-stack Web Developer. Javascript stack in Front End and Backend. (AngularJS, Angular2,3,4,5,6 , React, node.js) 
PHP with Laravel and codeigniter.

team.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
team.name: Dio Villasencio
team.bioHtml: Over 10 years experience developing small to large apps. Particularly good at implementing and designing features the right way who priorities quality.

team.title: Data Scientist
team.name: Mukul Jain
team.bioHtml: Data Scientist with experience in predictive modeling, forecasting, statistical data analysis, and computer vision.

jobs.title: Junior Sales representative
jobs.description:
Exciting opportunity to join a you, dynamic and fast growing tech startup! We're looking for 2 junior business development representatives to join our London team with head offices in Chelsea Harbour. Ideally, you will have some sales experience but you will also get excellent training from our existing sales team who have plenty of experience in both, sales and training. You will be progressing quickly and have more and more responsibilities within a short period of time. 



We are open to graduates, if you're hungry, well articulated and can make your case - we'll definitely have a chat with you. 



Business Development Representative core responsibilities include:

Lead Research and prospecting
Pre-qualifying leads from marketing campaigns as sales outreach initiatives
Contacting potential clients through cold calls and emails
Reporting to the Head of Client Acquisition


Job brief


We are looking for a Business Development Representative to act as the liaison between our sales and marketing outreach initiatives and the Sales Managers. Your role will be to seek new business opportunities by contacting and developing relationships with potential clients, respond to requests, jump on calls to understand how ZINE might be the answer to all their problems, give demos of the platform and sooner or later, start handling the commercial aspects of a deal. 



To be successful in this role, you should have previous experience developing leads from marketing campaigns and meeting sales quotas. You will use your communication skills to cultivate strong relationships with prospective clients, from first contact, to booking sales meetings and demo’s. You will have an active interest in social media and influencer marketing. If you are highly motivated and results-driven, and enjoy working in a team environment, we’d like to meet you.



Ultimately, you will help boost sales and contribute to our long-term business growth.



Competitive base salary and attractive bonus schemes offered.



About ZINE

ZINE is a fast-growing SaaS platform, connecting influencers around the world with Brands and Agencies for creative collaborations and content creation across social channels. We have a database of 50,000 influencers and a fully-fledged campaign management suite to fast track influencer activation at scale. Our team is young, dynamic and creative. We are tech-savvy, growth hackers, product focussed and always on top of the latest industry trends and evolutions - which is key in a fast growing and continuously evolving industry.



Benefits

Our offices are located in Chelsea Harbour, together with a number of other young businesses. We have a big communal open plan kitchen, lunch delivered to the office every day for free, as much coffee as you like and fridges full of beer and other beverages! There is a subsidised gym right next to the office too (in case you go to heavy on the biscuits and snacks). You'll be working with a young, fun and motivated team - we love our jobs but we also like to go for a drink sometimes, have activities and offsites with the team.



Detailed Responsibilities

Prospecting - research and pre-qualify leads from a variety of sources including trade press, social media and Linkedin for example
Proactively seek new business opportunities in the market
Qualify leads from marketing campaigns as sales opportunities
Sales CRM updating
Outreach and contact prospects through cold calls and emails
Book and make sales qualification calls
Introduce ZINE to prospects
Identify prospects needs and challenges with influencer marketing then suggest appropriate features and product/service solutions
Objection handling
Build rapport for long-term trusting commercial relationships with clients
Proactively seek new business opportunities in the influencer market
Set up meetings or calls between (prospective) clients and Sales Managers
Consistently meet productivity and sales targets
Report to the Head of Client Acquisition and the Sales Team on (weekly/monthly/quarterly) sales results
Stay up-to-date with new products/services and new pricing/payment plans
Keep abreast of competitors and their new feature updates
Attend events, trade shows and industry/vertical focused events (new product launches and fashion shows)
Requirements
Proven work experience as a business development researcher, Sales Executive or similar role
Hands-on experience with multiple sales techniques (including cold calls)
Track record of achieving sales quotas
Experience with CRM software (e.g. Salesforce)
Familiarity with MS Excel (analyzing spreadsheets and charts)
Understanding of sales performance metrics
Excellent communication and negotiation skills
Energetic and self motivating
Demonstrate initiative skills
BSc degree in Marketing, Business Administration (optional) or relevant field

jobs.title: Customer Success Manager
jobs.description:
**We are looking for an enthusiastic, driven User Success Manager to join our fast-growing start-up!**

ZINE is a fast-growing influencer marketing company, connecting influencers around the world with top Brands and Agencies for creative collaborations and content creation across social channels. We have a huge database of influencers and a fully-fledged campaign management suite to fast track influencer activation at scale. Our team is young, dynamic and creative. We are tech-savvy, growth hackers, product-focussed and always on top of the latest industry trends and evolutions - which is key in a fast-growing and continuously evolving industry.

**Your role at ZINE**

Our platform has two types of users, influencers and brands. Both have to be able to navigate through the platform and collaborations with ease, meaning the platform does what they expect it to do at any given point in time as well as there being sufficient supporting documentation to assist in more complex tasks. It is your responsibility to monitor and analyse the success of our users, brands and influencers and ensure that they have a seamless experience across the product. The success of your work will be reflected in the satisfaction of our users (brands and influencers).

**Your Skillset**

Customer Success
Product Marketing
Social Media savvy (influencer marketing experience is a plus)

**Your broad objectives as Customer/User Success Manager are**

Ensure effective (self) onboarding of brands and influencers
Ensure customer (brand) satisfaction when using the product throughout the licence term
Enabling users to make the most out of ZINE by introducing them to new and existing features and upgrade their licences where possible
Know the ZINE platform inside out
Stay on top of the latest trends and gossip in the influencer marketing industry, develop your understanding of influencer marketing strategies and help ZINE and their clients to take their campaigns to the next level
Benefits

Our offices are located in Chelsea, together with a number of other young businesses. We have a big communal open plan kitchen, lunch delivered to the office every day, as much coffee as you like and fridges full of beer and other beverages! You'll be working with a young, fun and motivated team - we love our jobs but also like to go for a drink sometimes, have activities and offsites with the team.
